item.title: [Python] Tips to know when competing programming with Python 2 (data structure)
item.description: [Tips to know when programming competitively in Python2](http://qiita.com/lethe2211/items/b91cc9e2b355ad32f1e6) is divided into data structures. The Python version is 2.7.5 (In Python3, specifications such as input/output are very different, so I recommend you to refer to other articles). int Integer type. Strictly speaking, Python integers have integer type int and long integer type long. Type is automatically converted by boundary value like Ruby’s Fixnum and Bignum There is no difference in methods that can be used with integer type and long integer type like BigInteger of Java So don’t worry too much about it.
